snippet.title: Mars Matrix - Sega Dreamcast - Arcade unlockable Capcom perfect playthrough [HD 1080p 60fps]
snippet.description:
So as our Dreamcast coverage comes to an end, we've uploaded the unlockable perfect mission playthrough / longplay found on the Mars Matrix disc. So there are six tutorial videos you can unlock in the shop each one covers a different stage. Now these videos aren't directly linked so the score doesn't carry over, the ship used changes from video and each one throws you back to the title screen after you've watched it. For this video however we have linked all six videos into one. The skill shown in each of these videos is superb and most players will take months of practice to get this good, so enjoy.

Fun fact this is a rebuilt port of the CPS2 arcade game and allows for far higher high scores as the Dreamcast port featured two extra digits in the scoreboard.

Also known as: Mars Matrix: Hyper Solid Shooting (Full title) マーズマトリックス (Japanese title)

Release: 2000
Developer: Takumi Corporation
Publisher: Capcom
Format: Sega Dreamcast (DC) / ドリームキャスト

Mars Matrix is not available on any other home system.

Randomised Gaming blog: http://randomisedgaming.tumblr.com  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rdmdgaming 

All footage in this video is captured directly from the Sega Dreamcast console, via an Elgato Game Capture HD60 Pro using a VGA to HDMI upscaler.
